column4: Can someone help me out? None of my applications have windows (title bar, minimize/maximize/close buttons, etc)
but like for example i open firefox
i can't even type in terminal o_o
it goes into my chat window
hold on a window popped up and its blocking the chat text
i think it's because i uninstalled compiz
how, i can't type in terminal :(
press Ctrl-Alt-F1 a few times, you'll get a console. Login there, run: DISPLAY=:0 metacity &
